title: South African bank FirstRand reports 5% rise in FY profit - Nasdaq.com
text: JOHANNESBURG, Sep 5 (Reuters) - South African lender FirstRand  said on Thursday its profit rose 5% in the year to June 30.
Diluted headline earnings per share (HEPS) rose to 497.2 cents($0.3263) from 472.7 cents a year earlier.
HEPS strips out certain one-off items and is the main profit measure in South Africa.
